message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $14,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's worth to you is $15,000. I'm confident you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $13,000 right now. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $13,800. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you is $15,000. Let me know what you think!
